Title: Kyrie Eleison
Plot: Masters begins a new job at Memorial Hospital under Betty's extortion terms only to discover that his boss insists he leave Virginia behind in favor of a handpicked secretary. Meanwhile, Johnson is torn between pressing Masters to rehire her and staying by DePaul's side as her condition worsens.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
